title: How does education technology benefit us as students? - Quora

response.answer_text: Technology is changing the way students learn but also the way professors teach! And this is great news. Times are changing and technology is everywhere. Putting this reality to the good of education is a must and the benefits from it are real! Technology can bring many benefits to education such as using these mobile devices that usually distract your students in class to a better good. This can be done by improving participation and interaction with your audience. One great benefit is for instance, the fact that technology enables very effective audience response systemsin classrooms. Audience response systems are a great way of increasing the level of participation and interaction with your audience and students tend to enjoy the class more and remember the content better. Wooclap is an awesome and easy tool for that. It’s a great interactive tool used on all devices; smartphones, tablets and computers. All you need is the link to the website and you can turn presentations, classes, meetings into a great interactive experience. It is a good way to change the rhythm of classes by transferring part of the learning directly to your participants. This allows great interaction, collaboration and more engagement from your classroom. Go check the website : https://www.wooclap.com/en/. Check out Wooclap’s twitter account: wooclap (@wooclap) | Twitter for more info on the benefits of technology in education!

It can benefit you in several ways. For example, it makes it easier for you to work more at your own pace, technology can also enable you to get more individualized instruction, it allows you to keep a lot of earlier work and to organize it in a way that makes sense to you (you don’t have to have tons of paper, it fits on a flash drive). The world is already running on computer technology, so it helps you to better understand the tools you will likely use in the career you choose, whatever it is.
